short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the back button on the Snowflake SQL console so you won't get logged out when scrolling through results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block the back button on the Snowflake SQL console when scrolling horizontally through results at the bottom. 

Automatically runs and has access to URLs matching: https://*.snowflakecomputing.com/*

https://github.com/sanmeetkanhere/snowflake-back-block
